website_summaries.verdict: Geared toward students, children, and home drumming hobbyists. Good budget alternative to save the most money.
pros: Decent amount of durability from a budget set of hi-hats
Can produce a good variety of percussive sounds and dynamics with the right technique and drum sticks
cons: Requires more effort to get good volume and dynamics out of the metal

customer_reviews.title: Great for practicing, but that's about it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these hi-hats as an upgrade to the starter hi-hats that come with a Pearl Roadshow set. They're certainly better than the hi-hats that came with the drum set, but they still do not sound the greatest. They're great if you need something to practice on if you're a beginner, but if you really care about the tones you're creating while playing drums, you'll probably be dissatisfied with these. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Josh F.

customer_reviews.title: Solid sound
customer_reviews.text: These sound great and I love playing them. The tone is rich and they feel solid enough to take a beating from relentless accents with the stick shoulder. The shiny brass looks good. Update 2018/03/08: I eventually got tired of the brassy sound. I came into a pair of Meinl MCS (B8 bronze) hats, and while they sound slightly better, I'm still looking to replace them with some B20 bronze hi-hats now. I still think the HCSs are a good value, but I personally won't add any more brass cymbals to my collection in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Quickshot

customer_reviews.title: The cymbals sound great.
customer_reviews.text: Pulling out so many beautiful tones with these. Great for performance cymbals. Using Zildjian 7a nylon tip along with matching 20" ride and China cymbal on the TAMA Club Jam Flyer.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for beginner cymbals
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for beginner cymbals. Short clean sound when closed, sound doesn't linger when open. Relatively high-pitched while closed; low-pitched while open.
customer_reviews.author: ypmass

customer_reviews.title: Had them over a year and still love them
customer_reviews.text: These will blow away any type of stock hats. If you bought a cheap kit like I did that came with some cymbals then these will make a world of difference. Will they stack up against high end hats ??? I dunno but I like them. Ive had them for over a year they are very durable The bell on these sound great. I dont think these hats should be overlooked!
customer_reviews.author: Dave809

customer_reviews.title: Great hi hat cymbals
customer_reviews.text: I love these cymbals. I've used some stagg cx hihats and some low level pearls and numerous no name cymbals and these easily have the best sound. Great reverb and very crisp cymbal to cymbal action. Great cymbals for any beginning or intermediate player. I'll probably upgrade to higher level meinls soon but for me these are awesome practice cymbals and for short performances, though i've havent done too many live concerts with these yet. Thus far I love these cymbals.
customer_reviews.author: gumpertman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about getting a "Value Line" of cymbals, but these do quite well in my home studio. When a buddy doesn't bring over his Zildjian K Custom Dark hats, we'll use these and get along just fine. These are obviously brighter, but they're also a fraction of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great hats for those who don't want to spend big money
customer_reviews.text: These hi hats are great. I recently bought a used set off a friend and the original cymbals (it came with a crash and a set of hi hats) were less than adequate. I did some research and found these to be my favorites of the inexpensive cymbal types. Meinl is from now on my brand of choice!
customer_reviews.author: Ewan McClelland

customer_reviews.title: Great Beginner/Intermediate hats
customer_reviews.text: These hats are really solid for a beginner/intermediate player, nice slosh, good bark, and overall feel and quality is very good. the stick chick is a little brassy, but compared to all of the other similarly prices entry level has, these take the cake. Have recommended them to other folks whose kids are learning drums as well.
customer_reviews.author: greenlava

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I think these are outstanding! I simply use these for private use when I just want to crank up some tunes and play a little but I wouldn't be afraid to use these at a small venue. The sound is decent but for the price, I'm not complaining! Glad I bought the 14's instead of the 13's!
customer_reviews.author: DJ JDay

customer_reviews.title: Some of the masterworks of Meinl!
customer_reviews.text: The sound you get from these hi hats are actually incredible for the price! But don't let that dismay you, I'd actually expect them to be a lot more if I didn't know what they were. I highly suggest these to any drummer, and especially for intermediate drummers or beginners! Highly satisfied ^-^
customer_reviews.author: austin

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: A great cymbal for the price! Playing the kit is even more fun when it sounds great!
customer_reviews.author: Hoffmann

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding at any price
customer_reviews.text: I would say these hi hats were outstanding for the money, but I think they are outstanding regardless. They have a lovely, rich ringout with pedal up or clutched loosely, and a nice sounding tick-tick when played tighter. Very full sounding and the 14 in does make a difference compared to the cheaper smaller ones we replaced. It should not matter, but they are beautiful as well.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Heintzelman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: It's a very great price and it sounds like it's as good as some of the more expensive pair of hi hats.
customer_reviews.author: Jones

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant Surprise
customer_reviews.text: Surprise! Best value in starter hi hats! Great "chick" and "closed" sound. The "swish" sound is good. Very well made. None better than these at this price or possibly double the price!
customer_reviews.author: Ivy Frank

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price to performance ratio. this is the best in the league.
customer_reviews.text: These are stellar high hats for the price, you kidding me? This is a great product, especially for hard hitters like myself. great product for this price.
customer_reviews.author: The Chairman

customer_reviews.title: I'd say one of the best set of hi-hat cymbals that you can get for ...
customer_reviews.text: I'd say one of the best set of hi-hat cymbals that you can get for this price. I use them in my Cajon set-up for church, and since the crash we had broke I use the top cymbal for a crash from time to time and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Steffens

customer_reviews.title: Love my Meinl Cymbals
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the money. Maybe a bit metallic sound but still a great buy. I also have a Meinl splash and china cymbal that I am happy with.
customer_reviews.author: Leta F Mastroni

customer_reviews.title: Happy with these.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure I "get" the negative feedback on these. I bought them based on Meinl's two demo videos they have on the Amazon page. Mine sound exactly like they did on the demo. Not sure how they sell them at this price but I'm glad I gave them a shot. They really do sound very good.
customer_reviews.author: David R Burns

customer_reviews.title: Very bright sound
customer_reviews.text: i bought these to replace my cheap paiste 302's. these blow them out of the water! very crisp! at first i almost thought they were too crisp, but now i love them. its a little tricky to get them open just right to get a full out wash without the stick definition, but its possible. Other than that they give a great *chick* closed and are great for rock partially open. Ive heard people say these are better than the A Customs, and while i dont really know about that, at this price it'd be worth sacrificing the zildjian name to go with the HCS.
customer_reviews.author: fordps3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home practice
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these hats for home practice with the HCS 20 ride as well. I use them with a Tama Club Mini kit. Good cymbals for home practice without being too loud.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Cirrito

customer_reviews.title: Very good hi-hat for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace the low quality hi-hat which came with my drum set. I have been using it for more than a month now and am very happy with the overall quality of sound. If you are looking for a budget hi-hat pair with reasonably good sound for all purpose drumming, I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: these things sound great. I have had this hi-hat for 2 years ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these things sound great. I have had this hi-hat for 2 years and it is still in great condition. Bought another one for an x-hat setup. Best budget cymbals on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They sound great very happy with order and would recommend them to anyone
customer_reviews.author: kerry s

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These cymbals are great they blow away the Ludwig ones
customer_reviews.author: Robert King

customer_reviews.title: Great cymbals for the price
customer_reviews.text: These sound just great for the price. Couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Ehlen

customer_reviews.title: Just got them and they seem fantastic. I have been playing them all day
customer_reviews.text: Just got them and they seem fantastic. I have been playing them all day. They are not too bright and have a solid sound. They are satisfying to hit and fit in well with the rest of my drum set. For this price you won't find a better high hat pair.
customer_reviews.author: Bigfoot

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Sound great, look great. Nothing more the say. Best for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron S.

customer_reviews.title: NO GOOD
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my hi hat and could not be more unhappy. They sound awful and would not recommend this product to anyone. They sound like they were purchased from a toy store. I should have returned them but as usual just put it off. I gave it a one star because they arrived on time as specified. Other then that the box it came in sounds better.
customer_reviews.author: kcarter4x4

customer_reviews.title: Great cymbal for the price!
customer_reviews.text: A great hi hat. Sounds awesome and isn't too expensive either. I would definitely recommend it to a drummer who wants to upgrade their cymbal. Was considering Zildjian, but Meinl less expensive and sounds just as good!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: quality great for a great price
customer_reviews.text: great cymbals for using as a secondary hi-hat sound at a great price
customer_reviews.author: David M. Zwieschowski

customer_reviews.title: nice weight and great sound
customer_reviews.text: Fast Delivery. I have a new drum set and Replaced all my crashes and hi-hat with Meinl Products and what can I say, durable, nice weight and great sound. Great Product for beginners and experienced drummers you cant go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: LargoMae

customer_reviews.title: Meinl 14in Hi Hat
customer_reviews.text: There are definitely better and more expensive Hi Hats in the market . But for the price and to replace the factory ones these are really good will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Webb

customer_reviews.title: These new cymbals fit my drum set perfect. I love the sound and how much ring ...
customer_reviews.text: These new cymbals fit my drum set perfect. I love the sound and how much ring I get off them. they are a perfect replacement for my last ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for novice drummer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Meinl Hi Hats along with the Gibraltar 5607 stand for my 15 year old grandson. He says they work great and was very pleased with the Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Meinl -- Great Quality and Prices
customer_reviews.text: The shipment got here on time, and I am so happy with the cymbals. These cymbals are really amazing for the price. Meinl makes some great quality cymbals. The 14" HCS Traditional Hi Hats have a crisp and bright sound to them. They fit well with my travel gig set.
customer_reviews.author: BBeary

customer_reviews.title: Good hi-hat cymbals.
customer_reviews.text: Good hi-hat cymbals. I've enjoyed using it so far. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A.H.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son for Christmas and he absolutely loves them. He loves the sound and durability of them and wants to keep using Meinl cymbals.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these high hats. They sound excellent, seem solidly built too. Very happy I ordered them. And you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: RickiDoo

customer_reviews.title: Great cymbals!
customer_reviews.text: Great cymbals! I highly recommend these if you're still a beginner like myself that need cymbals to practice with. Happy drumming!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Taing

customer_reviews.title: Lesson Teacher Recommended Product
customer_reviews.text: These were the perfect set for my son's Hi-Hat setup. He's a young learner & having a quality hi-hat setup made a huge difference when we added it to his kit.

customer_reviews.title: ... on a little tinny in sound was hoping for better quality overall ok for beginner not advanced
customer_reviews.text: they are on a little tinny in sound was hoping for better quality overall ok for beginner not advanced players

customer_reviews.title: so much better than his last set of high
customer_reviews.text: arrive on time gave this to our 14 yr old for his birthday he loves them!!! so much better than his last set of high hats

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive cymbals. .
customer_reviews.text: I never heard of this company, so I was having second thoughts about buying them. I had Sabian B8 cymbals before this. These are just as good like the open and closed sound.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding hi- hats for a great price i was using sabian xs and still these blew the sabian ones out of the water!! great product if you are not looking to spend a boat load of money!!!
customer_reviews.author: ludwig1210

customer_reviews.title: and turned out to be an excellent choice.
customer_reviews.text: High quality cymbals. Bought this to replace a starter-level hi-hat pair, and turned out to be an excellent choice.

customer_reviews.title: great job meinl
customer_reviews.text: I realy like the sound of this hi-hat. For the price the quality is good. If this one is damaged after a few years of playing on it,i would buy it again.

customer_reviews.title: Love these hats!!!
customer_reviews.text: Recently got back into playing, and purchased these to replace factory hats, and you are not going to get a better deal for the price!! Look forward to getting more cymbals from this company!!
customer_reviews.author: back behind the kit

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: For the price awsome real durable...reason for 3⭐ Is they start out really crisp then morph into this very dull sound and i would say with moderate play not beating the $H!t out of them

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound with great looks!

customer_reviews.title: love them!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received mine somehow I bought 2 sets. Other than that great fast 2 day shipping can't wait to try them out!!! Guess I will sell the other pair. Lol...

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cymbals for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sounding cymbals for the price. Nice clean chunk sound for funk and the like. Seem very sturdy. You really can't go wrong at this price point.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The menial 14 inch has hi hat is great. It is durable. It sounds great open and closed.

customer_reviews.title: High Hat Replacement
customer_reviews.text: My son thoroughly enjoys this high hat. Blessings, Y Bogany

customer_reviews.title: 14 Inch High Hats
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these high hats to replace the ones on the drum set at my church.I think they are fantastic. The sound is great. I would highly recomend buying these high hats.I shopped around and I couldn't find any at this good quality for less money.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They sound great, and the price can't be beat. A superb value.

customer_reviews.title: Terrífic!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these Hi Hats. Sound incredible!! Buy another pair to improve my set!

customer_reviews.title: Ping!
customer_reviews.text: Great cymbals for the price. I have no idea how long they'll last. I relied on other reviews and think I got my money's worth.

customer_reviews.title: Good for last minute hihats for me on a budget ...
customer_reviews.text: Good for last minute hihats for me on a budget and for for future begginer drummers . It haves a nice crisp sound
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan S.

customer_reviews.title: sturdy construction, sound great
customer_reviews.text: Came on time, sturdy construction,sound great, and my 15 year old was happy with item.
customer_reviews.author: B. Delventura

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Pretty Good For the Price...
customer_reviews.text: I have played many drumsets and these cymbals sound like the cymbals the pro's use. Would recommend to any one.
customer_reviews.author: Taurus Young

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I have been drumming for eight years and have tried a variety of cymbals. Mainly zildjian, but a lot of my favorite drummers (Matt Gartska, Nathan Camarena) use Meinl so I decided to give these a try. They sound amazing,especially when open. They provide a crisp,articulate, and bright sound when closed and I couldn't be happier with them. I'll definitely be converting my cymbal set up to Meinl. Thanks for the great product at an affordable price!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great !!
customer_reviews.text: ordered these for a 16 year old who has a drum set that is fairly old. He new he was getting one cymbal but when he opened these christmas day his eye were brighter then the bulbs on the tree. He loved them
customer_reviews.author: Laural A

customer_reviews.title: Meinl HCS Hi Hats
customer_reviews.text: Well you get what you pay for, these were chep and they sound cheap, I have two drumsets but I only had one set of Hi hats for my performing kit so I needed a set for my practice kit and I was short on cash so I bought these. I am saving my money now so I can buy some Real Hi Hats.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Wright

customer_reviews.title: A light crisp sound for all applications.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sound from a medium to light end cymbal. They pack easily and are secure in your pack. if looking for a lightweight cymbal, Meinl is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: robert w valente

customer_reviews.title: great product work great luv them
customer_reviews.text: so much cant wait to play .durable well made most bang for buck great cymbals
customer_reviews.author: steve bensman

product_meta.title: Meinl 14” Hihat (Hi Hat) Cymbal Pair – HCS Traditional Finish Brass for Drum Set, Made In Germany, 2-YEAR WARRANTY (HCS14H)
product_meta.description: These Brass alloy models sound and look great, and let you get into playing Meinl at very realistic prices. The HCS series from Meinl Cymbals is designed to offer all of the cymbal types and sizes normally found in professional lines to beginners, in order to deliver the same sound options a working drummer may look for. The 14" Hi Hats in the HCS line have gained immense popularity due to their versatility, durability, and outstanding sound quality. When played closed, these Hi Hats have a crisp "chick" Sound along with warm undertones that carry over when played open. Meinl HCS cymbals are recommended for any style of music a beginner may be getting into while exploring their sound.
feature_bullets: Includes top and bottom cymbals — the HCS 14” hihats are comprised of two cymbals that players mount on a pedal activated stand to play them with your sticks closed together or opened apart and with your foot to create a "chick" sound (stand not included)

Hihats are the most important cymbals on a drum set — the main time keeping ingredients for drumming are bass drum, snare drum and hihat cymbals — together, these form the foundation of drum set playing for any style

Designed for beginners and students — Meinl HCS cymbals are designed for beginner and student musicians using a durable brass alloy that maintains its tone while holding up to the brunt of drum sticks — these cymbals are ideal for any style of music

Made in Germany — when you open the box, the first thing you will notice is these cymbals bear the exact same markings as professional Meinl cymbals — they feature the large Meinl stamp and a smaller laser engraved logo with the text “Made in Germany”

Full range of sounds — unique to this price range, HCS cymbals offer all of the cymbal types and sizes normally found in professional set ups to beginners — from trash crashes and splashes to bells and chinas, any sound option is within reach

Great for instructors — Meinl HCS cymbals are made for new players who are learning their way around the drum set — teachers will find these to be an outstanding affordable solution to outfit their lesson sets with in a studio or classroom

Manufacturer disclaimer — typographical or grammatical errors found in the bullet point or description text on this product page are a result of this site’s system and are neither the fault of the manufacturer nor marketplace sellers
